doc.description: Universal caching class: called once per request, it holds the cache system.

name: bbn\Cache

_init.name: _init

_dir.name: _dir

_file.name: _file

makeHash.name: makeHash
makeHash.summary: Makes a unique hash out of whatever value which will be used to check if the value has changed.

doc.description: Makes a unique hash out of whatever value which will be used to check if the value has changed.

makeHash.comments:
/**
   * Makes a unique hash out of whatever value which will be used to check if the value has changed.
   *
   * @param $value
   * @return string The hash
   */

getType.name: getType
getType.summary: Returns the type of cache engine running in the class.

doc.description: Returns the type of cache engine running in the class.

getType.comments:
/**
   * Returns the type of cache engine running in the class.
   *
   * @return string The cache engine
   */

ttl.name: ttl
ttl.summary: Returns a length in seconds based on the given parameter, allowing strings such as xl or s to be given as ttl arguments.

doc.description: Returns a length in seconds based on the given parameter, allowing strings such as xl or s to be given as ttl arguments.

ttl.comments:
/**
   * Returns a length in seconds based on the given parameter, allowing strings such as xl or s to be given as ttl arguments.
   *
   * @param string|int $ttl
   * @return int The corresponding length in seconds.
   */

getCache.name: getCache
getCache.summary: Returns the cache object (and creates one of the given type if it doesn't exist).

doc.description: Returns the cache object (and creates one of the given type if it doesn't exist).

getCache.comments:
/**
   * Returns the cache object (and creates one of the given type if it doesn't exist).
   *
   * @param string $engine
   * @return self
   */

getEngine.name: getEngine

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: Constructor - this is a singleton: it can't be called more then once.

arguments.name: engine
arguments.description: The type of engine to use

doc.description: Constructor - this is a singleton: it can't be called more then once.

params.name: $engine
params.description: The type of engine to use

__construct.comments:
/**
     * Constructor - this is a singleton: it can't be called more then once.
     *
     * @param null|string $engine The type of engine to use
     *
     * @throws Exception
     */

has.name: has
has.summary: Checks whether a valid cache exists for the given item.

doc.description: Checks whether a valid cache exists for the given item.

has.comments:
/**
   * Checks whether a valid cache exists for the given item.
   *
   * @param string     $key The name of the item
   * @param null|int|string $ttl  The time-to-live value
   * @return bool
   */

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Removes the given item from the cache.

doc.description: Removes the given item from the cache.

delete.comments:
/**
   * Removes the given item from the cache.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @return bool
   */

deleteAll.name: deleteAll
deleteAll.summary: Deletes all the cache from the given path or globally if none is given.

arguments.name: st
arguments.description: The path of the items to delete

doc.description: Deletes all the cache from the given path or globally if none is given.

params.name: $st
params.description: The path of the items to delete

deleteAll.comments:
/**
     * Deletes all the cache from the given path or globally if none is given.
     *
     * @param string|null $st The path of the items to delete
     *
     * @return bool|int
     */

clear.name: clear
clear.comments:
/**
   * Deletes all the cache globally.
   *
   * @return self
   */

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.summary: Returns the timestamp of the given item.

doc.description: Returns the timestamp of the given item.

timestamp.comments:
/**
   * Returns the timestamp of the given item.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @return null|int
   */

hash.name: hash
hash.summary: Returns the hash of the given item.

doc.description: Returns the hash of the given item.

hash.comments:
/**
   * Returns the hash of the given item.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @return null|string
   */

isNew.name: isNew
isNew.summary: Checks whether or not the given item is more recent than the given timestamp.

arguments.name: time
arguments.description: The timestamp to which the item's timestamp will be compared

doc.description: Checks whether or not the given item is more recent than the given timestamp.

params.name: $time
params.description: The timestamp to which the item's timestamp will be compared

isNew.comments:
/**
   * Checks whether or not the given item is more recent than the given timestamp.
   *
   * @param string   $key The name of the item
   * @param null|int $time The timestamp to which the item's timestamp will be compared
   * @return bool
   */

set.name: set
set.summary: Stores the given value in the cache for as long as says the TTL.

arguments.name: val
arguments.description: The value to be stored in the cache

arguments.name: ttl
arguments.description: The length in seconds during which the value will be considered as valid

doc.description: Stores the given value in the cache for as long as says the TTL.

params.name: $val
params.description: The value to be stored in the cache

params.name: $ttl
params.description: The length in seconds during which the value will be considered as valid

doc.return: Returns true in case of success false otherwise

set.comments:
/**
   * Stores the given value in the cache for as long as says the TTL.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @param mixed  $val  The value to be stored in the cache
   * @param int    $ttl  The length in seconds during which the value will be considered as valid
   * @return bool Returns true in case of success false otherwise
   */

isChanged.name: isChanged
isChanged.summary: Checks if the value of the item corresponds to the given hash.

arguments.name: hash
arguments.description: A MD5 hash to compare with

doc.description: Checks if the value of the item corresponds to the given hash.

params.name: $hash
params.description: A MD5 hash to compare with

doc.return: Returns true if the hashes are different, false otherwise

isChanged.comments:
/**
   * Checks if the value of the item corresponds to the given hash.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @param string $hash A MD5 hash to compare with
   * @return bool Returns true if the hashes are different, false otherwise
   */

getRaw.name: getRaw
getRaw.summary: Returns the cache object (array) as stored.

doc.description: Returns the cache object (array) as stored.

getRaw.comments:
/**
   * Returns the cache object (array) as stored.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @param int    $ttl  The cache length
   * @return null|array
   */

get.name: get
get.summary: Returns the cache value, false otherwise.

doc.description: Returns the cache value, false otherwise.

get.comments:
/**
   * Returns the cache value, false otherwise.
   *
   * @param string $key The name of the item
   * @param int    $ttl  The cache length
   * @return mixed
   */

getSet.name: getSet
getSet.summary: Returns the cache for the given item, but if expired or absent creates it before by running the provided function.

arguments.name: fn
arguments.description: The function which returns the value for the cache

doc.description: Returns the cache for the given item, but if expired or absent creates it before by running the provided function.

params.name: $fn
params.description: The function which returns the value for the cache

getSet.comments:
/**
     * Returns the cache for the given item, but if expired or absent creates it before by running the provided function.
     *
     * @param callable $fn   The function which returns the value for the cache
     * @param string   $key The name of the item
     * @param int      $ttl  The cache length
     *
     * @return mixed
     * @throws Exception
     */

info.name: info

stat.name: stat

items.name: items

getMultiple.name: getMultiple

setMultiple.name: setMultiple

deleteMultiple.name: deleteMultiple

dummyComments:

summary: Universal caching class: called once per request, it holds the cache system.
